MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. Our emergency response team have advised that in order to complete a repair on a section of our underground cable network near Royston Petrol Station, we need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3.30PM. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 6.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2.32PM on 11 October 2020.
